title: Audi CEO: We Have 100 Steering Wheel Options — We Only Need Four
description: Luxury buyers like to customize. Porsche offers millions of options and possible combinations for each of the vehicles in its extensive lineup of sports cars, sedans, wagons, and SUVs. Other brands do too, like Audi. However, Audi will adjust its approach following the debut of its new Concept C ...
titleSummary: Audi's CEO Claims Excess in Design, Argues Simplicity Will Reign Supreme
descriptionSummary: Avid luxury car enthusiasts crave personalization. Porsche's expansive range offers countless customization possibilities, but rival brand Audi is set to adapt its strategy following a significant reveal: the introduction of its sleek Concept C.

title: Everything We Know About the Upcoming 2026 BMW iX3
description: If you don’t like the current BMW design language, that may change with the arrival of its biggest change to date: the next design era, known as Neue Klasse. Its first model will be the fully electric iX3, which will debut at the BMW Group Keynote on September 5th. BMW tells us that the Neue Klasse ...
titleSummary: BMW Unveils Plans for Electric SUV, Set to Shake Up the Market in 2026
descriptionSummary: BMW is poised for a significant styling overhaul with its Neue Klasse, a new design era set to launch this fall. The first model to embody this fresh look will be the all-electric iX3, premiering at the BMW Group Keynote on September 5th.

title: Your Next EV Charge Might Take Place at a Gas Station
description: One seemingly obvious difference between EVs and gas cars is the way each vehicle is refueled, but charging an electric car can be a wildly different experience from filling up a car's or truck's gas tank. In the heyday of highway motoring, full-service stations used to do much more than fill up ...
titleSummary: Electric Cars Get Charged Up at Familiar Fuel Stops
descriptionSummary: Fueling an electric vehicle is a distinct departure from the traditional gas station experience. Gone are the days of bustling roadside stops where attendants not only filled tanks but also provided services and amenities that came with the journey.

title: No More Chinese Code in Your Car: What 2027 Rules Mean
description: Starting with Model Year 2027, the U.S. bans “covered software” from Chinese- or Russian-controlled suppliers in any new connected vehicle sold here. It also bars sales by manufacturers with a sufficient nexus to China or Russia. For hardware in the Vehicle Connectivity System (VCS), the cut-off ...
titleSummary: "Say Goodbye to Beijing-Made Auto Tech: How New Laws Will Impact Vehicles"
descriptionSummary: As of Model Year 2027, the US will prohibit "covered software" from Chinese- and Russian-controlled suppliers in newly manufactured vehicles, and restrict sales by companies with significant ties to those countries. The ban also applies to vehicle hardware components.

title: Hyundai Factory Workers Launch Strike Over Hours & Pay Disputes
description: According to a report published by Reuters and The Wall Street Journal, South Korean automotive giant Hyundai is facing strike action this week at three different factories in its native country in an effort to press the automaker for shorter working hours, a retirement-age extension, and higher ...
titleSummary: "Hyundai Plant Halted by Labor Unrest Over Wages and Shift Schedule Grievances"
descriptionSummary: Hyundai workers in South Korea are set to stage a nationwide strike at three major factories, demanding reduced working hours, extended retirement ages, and improved compensation. The dispute has garnered significant attention from global business outlets.

title: Ford's Best Off-Road Bronco Just Got A Huge Discount, But It Won't Last
description: The Ford Bronco Raptor is about as high-performance as off-road SUVs get. The problem is, making an SUV with a $38,000 MSRP into a high-performance off-road SUV drives up the price quite a bit. However, shoppers in New York and California have a chance to save a solid chunk of change off a 2024 ...
titleSummary: "Ford Drops Price on Its Most Adventurous Bronco - But for How Long?"
descriptionSummary: The Ford Bronco Raptor is one of the most extreme off-road SUVs on the market, but its high-performance capabilities come at a steep cost. Now, buyers in key states can snag the 2024 model at a lower price point than elsewhere in the US.

title: Classic Rolls-Royce Corniche Restomod Packs 500 HP and 300 Miles of Electric Range
description: Electric conversions of classic cars have become quite popular, but two new firms hope they can still make a mark. U.K.-based Halcyon and Evice Technologies were founded by the same trio of engineers, with Evice focusing on electric powertrain hardware and Halcyon focusing on restomods of classic ...
titleSummary: Luxury Icon Revived: Electric Corniche Boasts Jaw-Dropping Power and Enduring Range
descriptionSummary: Two fledgling companies, Halcyon and Evice Technologies, are shaking up the classic car scene with innovative electric conversions. Founded by a trio of U.K.-based engineers, they're bringing fresh energy to timeless vehicles.

title: VW EVs Won't Sound Like Math Problems Anymore — Meet the New Names
description: Volkswagen is rebranding its all-electric ID models, applying the names from established internal-combustion models to the EVs. That starts with the ID.2all concept, which previews an affordable EV due to enter production in 2026. That production model will now be known as the ID.Polo, and there ...
titleSummary: "Volkswagen Gives Electric Vehicles Human Touch with New Model Names Revealed"
descriptionSummary: Volkswagen is renaming its electric ID series by drawing from iconic internal combustion models. The ID.2all concept, a budget-friendly EV set for 2026 production, will become the ID.Polo, marking the first of several rebranding efforts across the lineup.

title: 2012 Lexus LFA With 10K Miles for Sale Amid Lexus Supercar Buzz
description: Every Lexus LFA that comes to market is an event, and this one is no different. A 2012 Lexus LFA showing just under 10,000 miles has surfaced for sale, giving collectors another chance to own one of Japan’s most iconic supercars. With only 500 examples ever built, the LFA was exclusive ...
titleSummary: "Lexus Supercar Rarity Hits Market with Unfinished Kilometers"
descriptionSummary: A rare opportunity has arisen for a discerning collector: a low-mileage 2012 Lexus LFA is now available for purchase, one of just 500 handcrafted Japanese supercars ever produced. Its exceptional rarity makes it a coveted prize among enthusiasts.

title: Nissan Addresses Z Nismo's Fatal Flaw with Three-Pedal Solution
description: When Nissan launched the reimagined Z sports car in 2022, enthusiasts celebrated the return of an affordable Japanese performance icon. When the range-topping Z Nismo arrived in 2024 offered solely with a nine-speed automatic transmission, potential customers weren’t happy. However, the ...
titleSummary: "Nismo Revival: Nissan Tackles Critical Issue with Manual Transmission Fix"
descriptionSummary: The highly anticipated Z sports car made its comeback in 2022, thrilling fans with its revitalized spirit and affordability. But when the flagship Z Nismo was introduced in 2024 as an auto-only model, enthusiasts were initially disappointed.

title: 3 Models Fueled GM’s EV Sales Record In August, But Dark Times Are Coming
description: General Motors has been the #2 EV brand in the United States for a while now, behind only Tesla in total sales, and that position was maintained in August. In fact, GM’s combined sales of over 21,000 units set a new all-time monthly record for the company’s EV sales, surpassing the previous monthly ...
titleSummary: GM's Electric Uptick Hides Storm Clouds on the Horizon
descriptionSummary: General Motors solidified its second-place ranking among US electric vehicle brands in August, trailing only Tesla in total sales. The automaker reached an all-time high for its EV sales last month, selling over 21,000 units nationwide.

title: Toyota Unveils V8 GR Supra for 2026 Supercars Season
description: We knew it was coming, and now Toyota has finally revealed its V8-powered GR Supra that will compete in the 2026 Repco Supercars Championship, marking the brand’s first official entry into Australia’s top racing category. The announcement came at Bathurst, the heart of Australian ...
titleSummary: "Supra Shifts into High Gear with New V8-Powered Rival for Supercar Championships"
descriptionSummary: Toyota has officially thrown its hat into Australia's premier motorsport competition, unveiling a V8-powered GR Supra set to tackle the 2026 Repco Supercars Championship in what marks a major milestone for the brand Down Under.

title: Porsche Just Stopped Taking Orders for Gas 718 Boxster and Cayman in the US
description: Production of the gasoline Porsche 718 Boxster and 718 Cayman sports cars is winding down. The automaker previously confirmed that it would stop building the mid-engine duo before the end of this year, likely to make way for all-electric replacements, but now it's officially too late to order a ...
titleSummary: US Sales of Porsche's Pure Gas-Powered 718 Models Now on Hold Indefinitely
descriptionSummary: The production run for Porsche's iconic gasoline-powered 718 Boxster and Cayman sports cars is coming to a close. The final gas-guzzlers will roll off the assembly line before year's end, paving the way for all-electric successors.

title: JLR Admits It Can’t Make a Safe Bulletproof Range Rover
description: Jaguar Land Rover (JLR) has admitted it cannot build an electric Range Rover that offers the same blast protection as its current armored gasoline models. That means the Range Rover Sentinel, the security SUV used by high-profile clients including UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer, will remain ...
titleSummary: "Range Rover's Armor Fails to Hold Up in Unforeseen Circumstances"
descriptionSummary: Jaguar Land Rover has revealed that its electric models can't match the armor-plated performance of their gas-powered counterparts. As a result, their armored Range Rover Sentinel, often used for VIP transportation, won't be electrified.

title: This Is What Happens When You Crash A Classic Car
description: Old cars are cool. They look neat, and they have that little bit of character that only time and nostalgia can grant something. But they do have a problem: old cars aren't very safe. In the name of illustrating that point, DEKRA, a road safety and testing firm, crashed a 40+ year-old Volkswagen ...
titleSummary: "Crashing through Time: The Destructive Consequences of Wrecking a Vintage Ride"
descriptionSummary: Classic vehicles are charming, with a unique character born from years of history and nostalgia. However, their age often compromises safety. A recent experiment by DEKRA, a leading road safety expert, starkly highlights this issue.

title: Rivian's Miami Vice R1S Charges Back to the 80s
description: Rivian has rolled out something totally rad for Miami. They just opened a new experience space with a retro-cool 2025 Rivian R1S that looks like it drove straight out of a Miami Vice episode. This custom R1S features teal and pink accents over white paint, with blue side stripes, pink tow hooks, ...
titleSummary: "Electric SUV Revives Neon Dreams with Retro-Inspired Design and Pulsating Performance"
descriptionSummary: Rivian has brought a splash of South Beach style to Miami with the grand opening of its latest experience space. A showstopping 2025 Rivian R1S takes center stage, donning a vibrant color scheme reminiscent of '80s Miami glamour.

title: Targa-Style Audi Concept C Unveiled, And It Has Big Shoes To Fill
description: Audi has unveiled the Concept C, a sleek electric roadster that sets the stage for the brand’s next chapter in design. With its sculpted proportions, minimalist interior, and a focus on “radical simplicity,” the two-seater hints at a production model that could replace both the TT and the R8 ...
titleSummary: "Retro Revival: Audi's Stunning New Concept Takes a Page from Its Legendary Past"
descriptionSummary: Audi debuts the Concept C, an electric roadster that marks a bold new direction for the brand's design language. This streamlined two-seater embodies "simplistic luxury" with its curvaceous lines and understated interior.

title: Data Shows Automotive Loans are Growing Significantly
description: It’s hardly news that shoppers are paying more than ever for their cars. However, it seems that instead of cutting back, more shoppers than ever are taking on payments that might make financial advisors wince. According to data published by Experian in its Q2 2025 State of the Automotive Finance ...
titleSummary: Auto Loan Debt Soars to Record Levels Amid Consumer Borrowing Surge
descriptionSummary: Car buyers are shouldering unprecedented financing costs, yet many aren't tightening their belts. A recent report reveals a growing number of consumers are opting for payment plans that could strain household budgets, sparking financial advisors' concerns.

title: Mini Unleashes Wild JCW Duo: Beach Cruiser Meets Track Monster
description: The original Mini was a faithful daily driver that was also at home on a racetrack, a duality Mini is trying to recapture with a pair of one-off John Cooper Works (JCW) hatches customized by clothing brand Deus Ex Machina. The duo—one gasoline, one electric—will debut at the 2025 Munich Auto Show, ...
titleSummary: "Coastal Charger Meets Circuit Beast: Mini's Turbocharged JCW Twins Unveiled"
descriptionSummary: The iconic Mini's dual personality - both a reliable daily driver and a track-ready thrill-seeker - is being reimagined in a unique pair of JCW hatches custom-built by Deus Ex Machina. A gasoline-powered and an electric model will make their debut at the 2025 Munich Auto Show.

title: Rivian CEO Warns: Chinese EVs Are Better, Not Cheaper
description: Everyone's talking about Chinese EVs. There's this narrative present in the industry right now that America is failing, China has surpassed us technologically, and its EVs are poised to wipe the floor with American OEMs should the day a Chinese EV ever be sold here. After all, American automakers ...
titleSummary: Chinese Electric Cars Surpass US Rivals in Quality and Efficiency Says Rivian Chief
descriptionSummary: A buzz surrounds Chinese electric vehicles as the industry grapples with concerns about the US lagging behind in innovation. Some predict that China's EVs will dominate the market if they're ever allowed to compete directly with American carmakers.

title: Mercedes-AMG and Adidas Link Up on EV-Inspired Bags and Sneakers
description: Although their respective excellence is in two completely different, but equally intriguing industries, Mercedes-AMG and Adidas are pioneers in exploring the limits of high performance. The Benz-backed tuning giant at Affalterbach has been the beating heart of the automaker’s high-performance ...
titleSummary: "High-Octane Style Meets Streetwear in Mercedes-AMG x Adidas Electric Collaboration"
descriptionSummary: Mercedes-AMG and Adidas may be industry leaders in vastly different fields, but they share a common spirit of innovation and excellence. Mercedes-AMG's Affalterbach outpost is renowned for pushing automotive performance to new heights.

title: BMW's First Hydrogen Cars Are Just 3 Years Away
description: BMW is no stranger to experimenting with alternative powertrains, having sold 3 million electrified models to date, but this time, they're trying something new. The brand has confirmed that its first hydrogen-powered production cars are set for 2028, with prototypes of its next-generation fuel cell ...
titleSummary: BMW Hopes to Hit the Road with Its First Hydrogen Vehicles by 2025
descriptionSummary: BMW is pushing the boundaries of electric mobility once again, having already sold 3 million hybrid and electrified vehicles. Next up, the company is set to debut a fleet of hydrogen-powered production cars in 2028, with pioneering prototypes already on the road.

title: After 6 Years, Toyota Echo Lawsuit Ends With a How-To Video
description: For years, Toyota drivers complained that their vehicles turned hands-free calls into a maddening experience. The system bounced voices back as an echo, making conversations nearly impossible. After a six-year legal battle, the class action lawsuit has finally been settled. The outcome? Fourteen ...
titleSummary: "Defunct Toyota Model Finally Settled Out of Court in Unconventional Fashion"
descriptionSummary: Toyota drivers who suffered through frustrating phone calls on the go can finally breathe a sigh of relief. A six-year lawsuit has ended with a settlement that addresses long-standing issues with the car's hands-free system.

title: Mercedes-Benz offloads Nissan stake as investor confidence declines
description: Nissan is attempting to rebound from a desperate financial situation that nearly led to a merger with Honda, but some investors aren't waiting around to see whether the automaker pulls it off. One of them just happens to be another large automaker. Mercedes-Benz has offloaded a 3.8% stake in Nissan ...
titleSummary: Mercedes-Benz Dumps Nissan Stake Amid Fading Investor Optimism
descriptionSummary: Nissan's efforts to recover from financial struggles that once threatened its very existence are being closely watched, but some investors are taking matters into their own hands. German rival Daimler has quietly sold a significant share of Nissan stock.

title: Rivian Adds Apple CarKey, But Still Refuses CarPlay Integration
description: Rivian owners with iPhones are about to get some long-awaited love. Apple CarKey support is coming soon to second-generation R1T and R1S models, letting drivers unlock and start their trucks or SUVs with an iPhone or Apple Watch — even when the device is in low-power “Power Reserve” mode. For ...
titleSummary: Rivian Joins App-Enabled Ranks, Yet Holds Firm on In-Car Entertainment Partnership Rejection
descriptionSummary: Rivian owners with iPhones are in for a treat. The electric vehicle maker has begun integrating Apple's CarKey feature into select models, enabling seamless keyless entry and ignition using an iPhone or Apple Watch.

title: Hyundai's compact EV concept gets an official name
description: Hyundai has revealed the name of a compact EV concept it plans to unveil at the upcoming 2025 Munich Auto Show: Concept Three. That indicates the eventual production version will likely be called the Hyundai Ioniq 3, even though some reports hinted the name would be Ioniq 2. But Hyundai has ...
titleSummary: Hyundai unveils name for its buzzworthy city-sized electric vehicle prototype.
descriptionSummary: Hyundai's compact electric vehicle concept is set to debut at the 2025 Munich Auto Show under the name Concept Three, suggesting a production model that will likely bear the Hyundai Ioniq 3 badge, rather than previously rumored Ioniq 2 moniker.

title: Tesla Revamps FSD Subscription With Trial Access Amid Scrutiny
description: Tesla is rewriting the playbook on how it sells its Full Self-Driving (FSD) software. Instead of burying the option behind menus or forcing buyers to fork out the full $8,000, Tesla has added the subscription option — along with a free trial — directly into its Design Studio vehicle ...
titleSummary: "Tesla Overhauls Full Self-Drive Service, Offers Free Test Period Under Fire"
descriptionSummary: Tesla has simplified access to its Full Self-Driving (FSD) software by introducing a subscription model and complimentary trial in its Design Studio, offering buyers a more flexible way to experience this advanced technology.

title: A Chinese vacuum maker wants to take on Bugatti
description: Dreame Technology, a Chinese electronics company best known for vacuum cleaners, this week announced that it would launch an electric supercar by 2027. As if that wasn't ambitious enough for a company new to the auto industry, Dreame specifically called out Bugatti in its announcement and said its ...
titleSummary: "China's Humble Maker Sets Sights on Supercar Supremacy with Bugatti Challenge"
descriptionSummary: Chinese electronics firm Dreame Technology is making a bold entrance into the automotive world, with plans to unveil an electric supercar by 2027. The company's announcement takes aim at luxury rivals like Bugatti, setting the bar high for its ambitious debut.

title: 2026 Charger Daytona Gets Cheaper, Yet Faces Tougher Odds
description: When Dodge unveiled the Charger Daytona, it billed the model as the next chapter in muscle car performance. What buyers got instead was an electric coupe that left much of its core audience unconvinced. The sound generator, futuristic styling, and the absence of a V6 or V8 were meant to push the ...
titleSummary: "Downsizing Dodge's Electric Dream: The Charger Daytona's Price Cut Puts it to the Test"
descriptionSummary: Dodge's Charger Daytona electrified expectations with promises of unparalleled muscle car prowess, but instead delivered a sleek, high-tech coupe that departed from traditional roots, leaving some enthusiasts skeptical about its performance credentials.

title: Jay Leno Tried to Save Car Culture – California Shut Him Down
description: California has always been the beating heart of American car culture, but lawmakers just reminded everyone that nostalgia doesn’t count for much at the Capitol. Senate Bill 712, better known as “Leno’s Law,” was meant to give classic car owners a break from the state’s strict smog check program. ...
titleSummary: "Leno's Automotive Dream Shifts into Reverse Amid California's Emissions Crackdown"
descriptionSummary: California's reputation as the epicenter of American car culture has been put on notice by lawmakers who are prioritizing policy over passion. A new law is set to change how classic cars navigate the state's rigorous emissions testing.

title: From Cybertruck to Cyber SUV? Tesla Leaves Hints, Not Answers
description: The Tesla Cybertruck was introduced with great anticipation, backed by more than a million reservations and the promise of a pickup that could rival traditional full-size trucks while undercutting them on price. The production version, however, fell far short of expectations. Only over 40,000 units ...
titleSummary: "Tesla Teases a New Model: A Next-Gen Electric Vehicle Beyond the Truck"
descriptionSummary: The Tesla Cybertruck's highly anticipated debut was met with excitement, fueled by over a million pre-orders and the promise of a budget-friendly pickup that could rival traditional full-size trucks. Unfortunately, its production iteration failed to live up to the hype.

title: Leaked: Audi’s New Sports Car Looks Like A TT And R8 Lovechild
description: The departure of the Audi TT and R8 with no immediate replacements was sad news for Audi enthusiasts. Currently, the brand has no genuine sports car, but Audi’s CEO raised hopes when he mentioned a concept would be coming soon, describing it as the company’s “TT moment 2.0” recently—strong words ...
titleSummary: "Spied: Audi's Mystery Sports Car Combines TT and R8 DNA"
descriptionSummary: Audi fans were dismayed to hear that the TT and R8 are leaving without direct successors, leaving the brand's sports car lineup in limbo – but fresh hope has emerged with rumors of a new concept on the horizon.

title: Volkswagen Teases Its Most Affordable Electric SUV Yet
description: Volkswagen has been steadily expanding its family of electric vehicles, but most of its current offerings sit in the midrange to premium end of the market. The ID.3 and ID.4 were solid VW offerings, yet both are priced beyond what many buyers would consider truly affordable. At the same time, ...
titleSummary: "VW Unveils Budget-Friendly EV Crossover: A New Entry Point for Eco-Minded Buyers"
descriptionSummary: Volkswagen has been building out its lineup of electric vehicles, but most have skewed towards higher price points. Its latest models, while well-received, may be out of reach for budget-conscious shoppers.

title: Feds Audit Tesla Over FSD Crashes — What Owners Should Know
description: The U.S. auto-safety regulator has opened an audit into Tesla after finding the company filed crash reports months late for incidents involving Autopilot and Full Self-Driving. Federal rules say those reports should arrive within one to five days of a company learning about a crash. Tesla told ...
titleSummary: "Tesla Faces Federal Scrutiny Over Autopilot-Related Wrecks: Key Facts for Drivers"
descriptionSummary: The US National Highway Traffic Safety Administration is conducting an investigation into Tesla's compliance with safety regulations, following allegations the company delayed filing reports on crashes involving its Autopilot and Full Self-Driving features.

title: Lotus Emira plug-in hybrid coming in 2027
description: Lotus is moving ahead with rumored plans to build a plug-in hybrid version of the Emira with its new "Hyper Hybrid" system, CEO Feng Qingfeng told analysts during the automaker's second-quarter financial results call. This plug-in hybrid system will first appear in an SUV, likely the Eletre, as ...
titleSummary: Lotus Unveils Electric Muscle: Plug-In Hybrid Emira Set to Roar in '27
descriptionSummary: Lotus is reportedly pursuing a plug-in hybrid variant of the Emira, featuring its new "Hyper Hybrid" technology. The innovative powertrain is expected to debut in the Eletre SUV before being adapted for other models.

title: Women Drivers Myth-Busted: 2025 Data Shows Men Lead Fatalities
description: “Women are worse drivers” hangs around because it flatters a stereotype, not because it’s true. Deep down we all know it is a trope, and the newest numbers from all over the world smash it. In Great Britain (2024 provisional), 76% of road fatalities were male and 61% of all casualties were male, ...
titleSummary: "Men Take Lead in Deadly Crashes, Challenging Stereotypes About Female Drivers"
descriptionSummary: The notion that women are worse drivers persists due to its appeal as a stereotype, rather than any factual basis. New data globally reveals this trope is unfounded, with men consistently accounting for the majority of accidents and fatalities on roads.

title: Stellantis Recalls 219,000 U.S. Vehicles Over Rear-View Camera Failure
description: Stellantis is recalling more than 219,000 vehicles in the United States because the rear-view camera can simply stop working and show nothing just when you’re backing toward your neighbor’s trash cans.The recall covers high-volume workhorses the Ram ProMaster (over 141,000 vehicles affected) and ...
titleSummary: "Stellantis Issues Mass Recall of American Cars Due to Faulty Backup Cameras"
descriptionSummary: Stellantis is issuing a massive recall of over 219,000 US vehicles due to a rearview camera issue that can cause it to suddenly malfunction when reversing, potentially leaving drivers without a clear view - or a glimpse into their neighbor's trash cans.

title: Another wagon bites the dust: Volvo V90 production to end
description: Volvo is ending production of its biggest, most luxurious wagon for other markets. Autocar reports that production of the Volvo V90 will cease this month, leaving the Swedish automaker that built its reputation with models like the 240, 740, and 850 wagons with just one example of the body style. ...
titleSummary: "Swedish Icon Set to Roll Off Assembly Lines for Good"
descriptionSummary: Volvo is discontinuing its flagship wagon in select markets as the company shifts focus. Production of the V90 will halt this month, leaving Volvo's product lineup with a sole representative from a storied tradition of wagons that defined the brand.

title: Tesla Terminates Contractor at Giga Texas, 82 Workers Laid Off
description: Tesla has unexpectedly terminated a contract with MPW Industrial Services at Gigafactory Texas, leaving 82 employees jobless almost overnight. A WARN notice filed with the Texas Workforce Commission confirmed the decision, which took effect September 1. For the workers—technicians, ...
titleSummary: "Mass Layoff Rocks Tesla's Giga Texas Facility in Shocking Staff Cuts"
descriptionSummary: In a sudden move, Tesla cancelled its contract with MPW Industrial Services at Gigafactory Texas, abruptly ending employment for 82 workers as of September 1. A formal notice has been filed with the Texas Workforce Commission.

title: Should You Wait for the 2026 Armada or Buy the 2025 at a Discount?
description: The Nissan Armada entered a new generation for 2025, but the 2026 model year already brings a sharper reality: higher prices across the board. The base SV 4x2 now starts at $58,840, which is about $1,320 more than the outgoing version. The ceiling has also shifted, with the Platinum Reserve 4x4 ...
titleSummary: "Armada Delay: To Defer or Save with Last Year's Model?"
descriptionSummary: The 2026 Nissan Armada marks a significant pricing shift, with a new base price of $58,840 for the SV 4x2 trim, a $1,320 increase over its predecessor. Top-tier models now command even higher sums.
